name: my-fullstack-app
description: A full-stack application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix frontend" "npm run start --prefix backend"
scripts.install: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.i: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
